__e: I know there's praying and all that but if I don't take what's coming to me as chances, I'd just starve.
I threatened to walk and you turned lean and hungry, and you clawed your way into a $15-million deal.
I'm both starving and another word for wanting food.
Uh, not as hungry as you are, apparently, but yeah, I-I could eat.
But here, I knew I was one of them and I shared the hunger of their spirit.
I chose you, I needed somebody as hungry as me to make it work.
